metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22892 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: There is an Assertion 'ecma_is_value_undefined (value) || ecma_is_value_null (value) || ecma_is_value_boolean (value) || ecma_is_value_number (value) || ecma_is_value_string (value) || ecma_is_value_bigint (value) || ecma_is_value_symbol (value) || ecma_is_value_object (value)' failed at jerry-core/ecma/base/ecma-helpers-value.c in Jerryscripts 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
